page.title: 20HIGHFIELD SCHOOL 1985
page.content: At 8-55 the whistle goe and then we go into the school.At 9-05 am all the classes go down to the assembly hall. We have 2 hymns,a story and a prayer. We finish about 9-30.Then we do our lessons for English and Maths.It is playtime at 10-10 until 10-30.We come in and do some more lessons like PE or SRA.Then at 12-00 it is dinner time and we have a cooked school dinner or sandwiches.I have ham in my sandwich. Then we go out to play in the playground until 1-15,we play ball against the wall.Then it is lessons again,we have art or project work. Playtime is at 2-20 until 2-35.Then we have a story and then we go home at 3-35. {By Julie Collin age 8.}
